Reviews.Title: Dell's Alien Benchmarks Well Even With I5
Reviews.Author: Let's Compare Options "Amazon Rocks"
Reviews.Content: Dell's ownership of Alienware hasn't hurt the franchise. I benchmarked this against 5 other machines, all with I7's (except the mac), including Dell's own loaded Inspiron and Asus' loaded laptop. For 400 bucks less: get this! The benchmarks in all categories were NOT notably different than the I7. Of course you also can get this with an I7 but in my case that would be ego, given nearly equal performance with not only heavy gaming, but also running Unity game programming island tree sims, which can even crash the most robust towers.I also hate to say this (because I'm not a big Apple fan), but a little 2011 Macbook at $300 LESS than this met both its and the I7 Dell's benchmarks. Ugh, but true. Sorry to all my fellow PC types.You can beef up Alienware to 3 grand plus like the good old days with ultra premium speakers, more flash, more RAM, etc. but that depends on your goals. If you're just looking for a lightning fast, high horsepower gaming machine that's also ideal for business and general computing, this is a great compromise. Comparing prices and features with tigerdirect, the price points here on Amazon are better, but tiger throws in Windows 8 where this often still comes with 7 (depending on when you read this, check it, it might be up to 8 in a bit).Doesn't matter to me, as 8 shines more with touchscreens and tablets, and frankly machines like the surface are sweet, but deprive you of a lot of "tablet" features you'd want like Google play, jelly bean, apps, etc. In that arena, the new Kindle takes the cake, beating out ipad in my humble opinion (see, I did manage to get an Apple jab in, even though I begrudgingly acknowledge mac IS fast). (The one I like is here: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB). I'm also not a big fan of the new appliances like chromebook that need the cloud for everything-- it is still nice to have your own files when wifi isn't around, and I can't afford big data plans ala 4G.Enjoy!Email answers: 1. Yes, Amazon's table has weight wrong, it's 6 pounds.  2. Yes, my comparison is with I5 overclocked to between 3.1 and 3.2. It does not take a lot of work to push the I5, and folks who just leave their I7 untouched out of the box are frankly paying $400 too much! The difference between the tiny overclock possible with 3.4 won't be seen even in the most advanced games (or intense other apps) once you tweak the 5. Also, the 7 is VERY dust and temp sensitive, and loaded inspirons get into auto shut offs constantly.Again, if you are less lazy than I am and frequently pull the cover for dust duty, its not an issue. Thankfully, the fix is usually a 5 minute fur ball removal in most cases! I'm not anti-7 in any sense, but just want to save you money as these AWs can be seriously expensive, and this model is one of the few full featured "deals" that really give you a major bang for your buck, even for apps like solving advanced polynomials with NumPy (supercomputer level math!) in addition to ram hogging gaming. If you're in High School, tell your parents this is for solving polynomial inequality competitions, and tell them you also want this book: Polynomials (Problem Books in Mathematics). Hey, if you do gaming too, it's not my fault! If you're a parent--  this IS a serious math machine, really! I teach math as well as game programming and it is a GREAT way for teens to stay interested in tech!!

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!
Reviews.Author: FRANK GRADIA JR
Reviews.Content: Honestly i was worried about ordering this model and not jumping onto one of the more expensive models but let me tell you its awesome. I have never written a review of anything on here but i am smitten with this laptop. The keyboard for me is Fantastic! I have been playing some games as well (Assassins Creed, The cave, Portal) and have had no issues. The build quality is a pleasure. At this point i have no complaints. Honestly an i5 processor is more than 95 percent of consumers will ever dream of using. I will update if anything happens to change my mind but at this point it made me sell my PS4!

Reviews.Title: BEST LAPTOP EVER
Reviews.Author: Kayci Stevenson
Reviews.Content: I play wow (one of the largest MMO's) and it runs anywhere from 70-100 fps on ultra graphics... i had a sony viao and it could only handle fair graphics at 15-25 fps.... it truly is a must buy.

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I expected more but it's ok to use on a regular basis.  Mild gaming, media transfer and as a secondary computer

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: movieguy2000
Reviews.Content: Nice computer. Not a touch screen in case anyone ask. Not as large as I wanted but it's still a good computer

Reviews.Title: greatness in one awesome computer
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I ordered my laptop a week ago. I was informed of where it was in and during shipment. when I received it today I could not believe the quality of the computer such a great product I can honestly say I don't plan on buying or upgrading to any other brand. plus the box it comes in is awesome I mean it is its own carrying case pretty much no doubt my favorite buy of all time

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Jingjun Chen
Reviews.Content: The laptop has a nice texture. The performance is great. Havent found a game that lags on this laptop. So far I have prototype2, bf4, nba2k14, skyrim, etc and they run smoothly on max settings. Its easy to carry around but the screen might be a lil small. Overall a great laptop.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product !!
Reviews.Author: Bogdan Nica
Reviews.Content: Everything exactly as described . Interface and the way this machine is very compact and sturdy is worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: great computer, my son is very happy with this product, I recommend to ones that love to play video games.
Reviews.Author: gustavo santillan
Reviews.Content: since the packaging the computer is different, is like a ferrari of the laptops ,the design is great, is the first we have but i do not think we can have another one new different from this one.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Once I figured out how to customize the controls to this laptop (mostly the touchpad control), I love it.  The lights are awesome and you can have several different colors and schemes.  I'm not a big gamer but I'm really pleased with the performance.

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: feng tao
Reviews.Content: very good, i like it, screen is soft, keyboard is soft and elastic, touchpad is comfortbale, it is a beautiful laptop.

Reviews.Title: cool computer
Reviews.Author: LIUSHU
Reviews.Content: Very powerful CPU and display.A perfect laptop for gaming.And the only weakness is ..... the amazon installs the Win7 Home Premium ...........

Reviews.Title: Defective out of the box
Reviews.Author: AKN
Reviews.Content: I soo wanted to love this.  It has a huge dead stripe right down the middle of the screen as soon as I unboxed it.  It also is not recognizing it's electrical cord for some reason so the battery won't charge.  I LOVE the keyboard, best keyboard ever and that is important to me.I ran the Windows Expereince test as soon as I got it and it is a sorry 3.5.  My ancient computers beat it.I also love the lit keyboard and mouse.Another problem, problem number three, is the way the mouse "sticks" at times and won't release ;the curser as I type.  I have to right click the mouse so that it is not dragging the curser arrow all over constantly.For the looks and typing experience nothing can beat this.  And it does weigh a ton. YOu won't want to keep this on your lap.Sigh.  So many problems right out of the box. I sadly won't be getting another replacement for this.  I have no idea how this could have been sold having so many problems.  Oh and just now when I tried to click on the submit button with the mouse, the entire screen resized by itself.  I am sorely disappointed. .

Reviews.Title: Great computer!
Reviews.Author: Ran Mouri
Reviews.Content: Very happy to have a computer of this quality for gaming and not have to upgrade to windows 8.  Thank you!  Item arrived on time, in new condition.

Reviews.Title: Is this McDonald's? Because I'm lovin' it!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Warren
Reviews.Content: This is a great computer. It is very fast and runs games very efficiently. Definitely a good buy if you want to play games at a very high FPS. Also, the weight table is wrong, it's actually 6 pounds, not 11.

Reviews.Title: Stunning
Reviews.Author: Parker Frontier
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with every aspect of this machine. The graphics performance is up to my most demanding games. Though I will run on High rather than Ultra (this is a GT 750m, not a GTX 750m, after all), that modest compromise is hardly noticeable. The performance/screen size tradeoff (1360 x 768, rather than full HD) is a good configuration as well; the graphics, particle effects, ambient occlusion, and so on, are as you would expect. The smaller screen lessens the vertigo I sometimes get with my desktop monitors (dual 27-inch diagonal LCD panels).I was particularly happy to discover that one of the ports was actually a headset port, which is perfect for using Teamspeak and Skype.This was a refurbished unit, and I've been very pleased indeed with the quality and performance of the machine. I would recommend it to any gamer as their away-from-home rig of choice, and at this price/performance point, there's nothing better.

Reviews.Title: I'm in love
Reviews.Author: booklover26
Reviews.Content: I bought a Mac and ended up returning it because I just couldn't get used to its format. I honestly tried. I decided to get this puppy because I work a lot in Photoshop and the graphics are great. I have no clue how it works with gaming, but as far as a laptop to travel with and yes, I like all the shiny lights, it's an excellent piece of hardware. Great investment.

Reviews.Title: perfect for me
Reviews.Author: L. Garrick
Reviews.Content: tI wanted a smaller computer because I do do some traveling, I am very happy with my decision on this computer. Its built like a tank, (which makes it a little burdensome for traveling, but it is well worth it's weight in gold, it's a great computer. I would recommend this computer to anyone, but warn them it is a little heavy.

Reviews.Title: it's amazing
Reviews.Author: Jared Dewayne Harrison
Reviews.Content: Have to admit this is the first actual gaming laptop i've ever had and it's amazing. At first I was very skeptical, since every other computer i've ever owned were never very good when it came to gaming. But since i've bought this I haven't regretted a single dollar that went into it.

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: Pablo Duarte
Reviews.Content: Great product it runs every game in ultra the only problem this computer has is that the edges start pelling and the material.

Reviews.Title: A Bizarre Shopping Experience.
Reviews.Author: Austin Somlo
Reviews.Content: I ordered the laptop direct through the manufacturer's website which is Dell and paid for it with a debit card. Obviously, I had the money for it and all that. Yet Dell canceled the order. I contacted the agents (some of them can't speak English well enough to be understood) and was rerouted so many times that I was either put on hold for so long or hung up on. When an agent spoke to me, he said that the order was all good and that I should disregard the notices. Next day, the order was canceled. This had happened twice more after renewing the orders. Finally, I've had enough and vowed that I will never buy a Dell product ever again in my life although this was my first time. Boy, this was a bizarre shopping experience. In fact, the same exact thing happened last year with the same result, so I gave it up. I was willing to give it another try but to no avail.***NOTE*** I pulled the trigger on ASUS ROG G750JM-DS71 17.3-inch Gaming Laptop, GeForce GTX 860M Graphics, and everything went flawlessly well. I am entirely pleased with this.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad deal.
Reviews.Author: Eric poling
Reviews.Content: I like this computer a lot more then my last one. It's really great for gaming and I can see a difference between it and a non gaming computer. However and I still haven't figured out why yet, but sometimes my display driver will fail and reboot itself. Overall I would recommend this computer to anyone who like me is looking to purchase their first gaming computer.

Reviews.Title: Crashes constantly
Reviews.Author: Barbara Austin
Reviews.Content: The laptop I received crashed twice in the first few hours I had it running. It crashed another 3 times in the next four days I had it before I returned it. At least Amazon was very helpful about returning it for a full refund, even including the cost of shipping it back to the States as I'm abroad.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: Merle
Reviews.Content: I know how some people like to say that Alienware computers are overpriced and while I can't deny they aren't cheap I feel they are worth it. This is my second Alienware laptop and I couldn't be happier. The display is simply amazing, it is plenty fast enough and I know it will last at least 4 years like my last one did. I am running Second Life on it, which is well known to kill computers, but I feel that this one is up to the task. No overheating to speak of and it does everything I ask it to do. Just because Dell bought out Alienware is no reason to trash the product in my opinion. If you are looking for a mid-range gaming laptop this is a deal.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Trevor
Reviews.Content: Its a good laptop. Very portable which is why I got it. It crashes sometimes but I think its because im putting out to much power on skyrim with the HD mods. Other than that its kinda fat, but it works like champ. Another thing is that the screen isnt too big, but I got use to it. Its a good laptop but crashes sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Just as I expected
Reviews.Author: Ricky
Reviews.Content: It was worth the money, and the time. I haven't had a better laptop or probably will have a better one. Once you get it, it feels great. Runs games really smooth as well and I'm extremely happy with it. Also, Amazon did a great 2 day shipping.

Reviews.Title: Good performance but bad positioning of the charging port because the power jack can easily brake if tipped toward its back.
Reviews.Author: Olimpiu
Reviews.Content: I'll start with the cons: the power cord is positioned in the back and it sticks out in such a way that if you are trying to tip it backwards ( for instance to get something from underneath it or.. to take a quick look at something at the front edge of it) ..well the chances are that you will brake the jack from the power cord and will damage the charging port ...It's a biiiggg issue for a laptop that costs 1000 $.Most laptops worth a 1000$ nowadays have the charging port sideways without sticking out like a javelin.I got this laptop for a week and it's running alright. I like its i5 4200 dual core, Nvidia card, 750 gb hard drive, 8 gb of ram and its sturdy lid. I did want a backlit keyboard and thats also one of the reasons i bought it, but all the other lights from the touchpad..and around it..etc. make this laptop look very geeky.I bought it because im running many programs simultaneously such as netbeans, jgrasp, movie dvd maker, downloading files...which takes a lot of ram and CPU power..SO far so good, but there are other laptops withing this price range with the power cord properly designed on a side, and packing the same quality of hardware, therefore im thinking returning it and buying something less likely to brake easily.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200M Processor (3MB Cache, up to 3.1GHz)
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
750 GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive
14-Inch Screen
Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit
ProductInfo.Name: Alienware 14 ALW14-1250sLV 14-Inch Gaming Laptop (i5-4200M, 8GB Memory, 750GB Hard Drive, 1GB NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, DVD+/-RW, Bluetooth, Windows 7 Home 64-bit)
